mapper.insert: insert into post (post_title, post_content,post_time, post_thumbs,post_userid, post_username, post_commons) values(#{postTitle},#{postContent},#{postTime},#{postThumbs},#{postUserid}, #{postUsername},#{postCommons})
mapper.select: select post_id,post_title,post_content,userinfo_img,userinfo_name,post_time,post_thumbs,post_commons from post join userinfo on post.post_userid = userinfo.userinfo_id order by post_time desc,post_title asc

select post_id,post_title,post_content,userinfo_img,userinfo_name,post_time,post_thumbs,post_commons from post join userinfo on post.post_userid = userinfo.userinfo_id order by post_commons desc,post_title asc

select post_id,post_title,post_content,userinfo_img,userinfo_name,post_time,post_thumbs,post_commons,userinfo_id from post join userinfo on post.post_userid = userinfo.userinfo_id where post_id = #{postId}
select * from post where post_title like '%${postTitle}%'
